execution.testSummary: Monogramming Configuration Page / Skip Monogramming (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Click on Add to Bag
teststep.result: -User is taken to the Monogramming Configuration page with the following messaging regarding monogram: Monogramming is just $8 or FREE with the L.L.Bean Visa Card Monogramming may add {2 days} processing time. With our 100% satisfaction guarantee, returns and exchanges are no problem." - This page will have dynamic item information and image on the page - The Product Name and Attributes will match selections made on PDP - The page will have 4 expandable/collapsible sections: The top section is titled “1. Choose Type:” The next section below Type is “2. Choose Style:” The section below Style is “3. Add Text:” The section below Text is “4. Choose Color:” The default state of all these sections is to be open - Color of monogram preview corresponds to default color selected - Background fabric in preview corresponds to customer selection made on Product Page - Preview image is not scalable, static message is displayed below preview indicating that "Sample image to show style and color only. Learn why actual character size can vary. - The preview swatch is square. - Below the Expandable/Collapsible sections are buttons to save a configured monogram and to decide not to configure a monogram - The Type choices, Style choices and Placement choices will all be pre-selected based on the most popular choice for each. - The Type choices, Style choices and Placement choices will have the left-most choice as the default selection.

teststep.step: Select a thread color different than default
teststep.result: - Monogram preview is updated with selected color

teststep.step: Click on "Skip Monogramm" at the bottom of the page
teststep.result: - User is brought back to the product page with the PASB overlay with no monogram selection. - Item is added to bag with no monogram configured.

execution.testSummary: Verify BC parameter is removed from the URL when user changes the departments. (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Mouse Hover over the KIDS department in Global Nav and click on Sleepwear in RON.
teststep.result: - Sleepwear page is displayed. - There is no BC parameter in the URL of the page.

teststep.step: Click Girls' Sleepwear SUB2 in left nav.
teststep.result: - Breadcrumb in the page is displayed as L.L.Bean>Kids'>Sleepwear>Girls' Sleepwear - There is no BC parameter in the URL of the page.

teststep.step: Click FOOTWEAR department in Global Nav.
teststep.result: - Footwear department lander is displayed.

teststep.step: Click on Boots under Men's Footwear
teststep.result: - User is navigated to Boots page.

teststep.step: Go to Network tab of developer toolbar, filter by XHR requests, Look for gnajax request URL.
teststep.result: - URL does not contain BC parameters of previous pages visited by the user, it contains BC parameter of the current department. E.g. http://ecwebq13.llbean.com/llb/gnajax/506794?bc=474&page=mens-boots&nav=ln-474&__t=1454610458088

teststep.step: Open the GNAJAX request URL in new browser window
teststep.result: - GNAJAX request content is loaded in the page in JSON Format.

teststep.step: Scroll down to the bottom of the GNAJAX response and verify isDefaultPath property value.
teststep.result: - isDefaultPath property is displayed with true value.

teststep.step: Verify userPathIds property values in GNAJAX response.
teststep.result: - userPathIds has IDs of the path taken by the user. E.g. 474, 629, 506794

teststep.step: Verify defaultPathIds property values in GNAJAX response.
teststep.result: - defaultPathIds has IDs of the default path to the page. E.g. 474, 629, 506794

teststep.step: Verify metricPathIds property values in GNAJAX response.
teststep.result: - metricPathIds values are same as userPathIds values. E.g. 474, 629, 506794

execution.testSummary: ODS Reservation for Sold Out Multi-day Event - Add to Wait List (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Click on an occurrence in the event calendar that is a multi-day event and is sold out
teststep.result: - Taken to correct Event page - Attribute drop downs are: Event location Session Number of Participants - Dropdowns are prefilled with Multi-Day display

teststep.step: Select 3* Participants on the Event page and click *Wait List button
teststep.result: - Wait List layer displays as follows: Title = Add to Wait List with copy If you add participants to the wait list, we will contact you in the event that spots become available. You will not be charged at this time, and this event will not appear in your shopping bag. This is not a reservation. If you’d like to make a reservation, please choose another time, date or location with open spots for participants. If you need assistance, please call 1-888-552-3261. - CTA: Add to wait list - No financials display on the Wait List Layer - Participant Fields are available for participant #1, participant #2 and participant #3 - Add Another Participant option available

teststep.step: Add more participants using the Add Another Participant option in the layer up to the max allowed
teststep.result: - Able to add Participants in the Wait List layer up to the lesser of the max participants for the event / location or the max reservation size (this should be a separate test step or test case) - Add Another Participant option no longer displays when max is met - Event details display at bottom of layer: Event Name City, State Date (friendly form, see copy deck) Each date is present with the corresponding time listed with it (mulit-day event)

teststep.step: Click Add to Wait List
teststep.result: - Layer closes - Add to Wait List confirmation layer loads - PASB does not load - Wait List reservation is not added to shopping bag

teststep.step: Check logs for confirmation that the Call was made to the web service
teststep.data: Need to add more info, see Dana for details

execution.testSummary: Search Breadcrumb Refinements - Search and Multiple Attributes (Tablet)

teststep.step: Enter a search term
teststep.result: Verify: - All displayed refinements show in Collapsed State on tablet (max of 10) - Attributes displayed are correct based on the department - Counts reflect the number of available products for the attribute - Open (+) / Close toggle (-) is displayed for each refinement - Categories (Sub depts) do not have a toggle - Refinements are appended to the lowest category in the breadcrumb in the order they were selected - Orderable attributes are presented as swatches (e.g. color, size, waist, inseam, etc) - Selected orderable attributes display with bold, orange border - Selected refinements display in breadcrumb followed by an 'X', in the order they were selected - Once an attribute is selected for any refinement group, (reset all) is displayed to the right of the Filter label - Refinements displayed in breadcrumb match refinements selected in left nav - Number of items available in header, left nav refinements, and cat header update based on refinements selected

teststep.step: Select department

execution.testSummary: Search Breadcrumb Refinements - Search and Attribute refinement (Desktop)

teststep.step: Enter a search term
teststep.result: Verify: - All displayed refinements show in Expanded State (max of 10) - Attributes displayed are correct based on the department - Counts reflect the number of available products for the attribute - Open (+) / Close toggle (-) is displayed for each refinement - Categories (Sub depts) do not have a toggle - Refinements are appended to the lowest category in the breadcrumb in the order they were selected - Orderable attributes are presented as swatches (e.g. color, size, waist, inseam, etc) - Selected orderable attributes display with bold, orange border - Selected refinements display in breadcrumb followed by an 'X', in the order they were selected - Once an attribute is selected for any refinement group, (reset all) is displayed to the right of the Filter label - '(clear)' displays after the refinement label once an attribute for that group is selected - Refinements displayed in breadcrumb match refinements selected in left nav - Number of items available in header, left nav refinements, and cat header update based on refinements selected

teststep.step: Select department
teststep.result: - Only refinements that are relevant to the results set display - Unavailable attributes do not display in refinements - Page does not reload between each selection of attributes

teststep.step: Select attributes to narrow results
teststep.result: As results are narrowed- only relevant refinements are retained (refinements not applicable to refined results do not display)

teststep.step: Uncheck attributes to return to a broader result
teststep.result: Unchecking attributes will add the removed attributes back into the refinement list and remove them from the breadcrumb

teststep.step: Select an Attribute Color Select a 2nd Attribute Color
teststep.result: Results match products that returned for both colors selected AND alternate attribute that is selected

teststep.step: Select another Attribute (not color or price)
teststep.result: Selection across attributes are reductive and Do change the counts for attributes selected across refinement groups

teststep.result: Check the following fields: Card Number: The last 5 digits of the gift card displays, the rest is covered by 'X'. Below the Card Number, the status of the GCD is displayed. Pin: The pin number is secured by 'X'. Available Balance: The global amount of the GCD is displayed. Amount Applied: this will display the amount that has been taken from the GCD, but won't be populated since there is not an order in progress.

execution.testSummary: Search Compare Layer validations and product details and remove items (Desktop, Tablet)

teststep.step: Click Compare button
teststep.result: - Compare layer loads in a fixed location over active page (Search Results, Grid or Grouped Thumbnail pages) - Compare layer loads with Active page auto scrolled to the top - Layer is not movable - Active page (Search Results, Grid or Grouped Thumbnail) is shaded to indicate it is not able to be interacted with - Compare layer does not extend beyond the width of the page - Products display in the order they are added - Remove link displays below each item - Buy this Item Button displays below the Remove link for each item (links to the Product Page) - Product Details display in the following order: Thumbnail image (Links to PP) Swatches Product Name (Links to PP) Price (Including Redlined) Merchandise text descriptor (ex: As Seen In, Limited Quantities) Ratings Stars - Product details display in a set column width, anything exceeding this span will wrap as necessary - Vertical space for Product details is not fixed and is set by the product with the longest/most information

teststep.result: - On click Product name the Product page displays - Clicking the browser Back button from the product page returns to the Search results page

teststep.step: Click on Compare button Click on Remove for all of the items at the Compare Layer
teststep.result: - Compare layer is Not refreshed after each item is removed - Products remain centered within each column but are left justified on the page - Removing last item from the page Closes the Compare layer and returns widget to Default state (widget hidden)

execution.testSummary: Bundles - Promo Bundle/ Add to Bag (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Scroll down and go to the Bundle Offer Zone
teststep.result: - BOZ header will display Buy Together and Save $x.xx - text "or more" won't be displayed since both items have single full price - BOZ pricing displays Separately: $xx.xx Together: $xx.xx - Separately = sum of the single price points of the primary and recommended items PRIOR to the discount - Together = sum of the single price points for the primary and recommended products with the discount applied - Buy Together button will display below these prices Ex: Product A = 39.00, Product B = 40.00, discount 10% Separately: $79.00 Together: $71.10 Note: the word "from" wont be display since both items has a single full price

teststep.step: Click on the Buy Together button
teststep.result: -Bundle Ordering layer header will say Buy Together and Save - For this header no price or discount should be displayed even if the bundle savings are above the threshold - View offer details link is displayed below the recommended product. - Pricing will display: Separately: $XX.XX Buy Together: $XX.XX - Separately = combined Sell price struck through with NO "from" word - Buy Together = combined discount price in red with NO "from" word

teststep.step: Click on View offer details link
teststep.result: - Offer detail content will be displayed (within an accordion) and will cause the height of the bundle layer to increase to accommodate the additional content being displayed -When the offer detail content is expanded, the link will change to Close offer details

teststep.step: Click on close offer details link
teststep.result: - Accordion will return back to its default state: no content, and the link will be displayed as view offer details" link

teststep.step: Make all the attribute selections and click on Add to Bag button
teststep.result: -Items are successfully added to Bag -Upon adding the bundle items to bag, the layer should close and PASB displays centered on the page.

execution.testSummary: Bundles - Item Pricing - Full Price/Range Sale-Full Price (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Click on Buy Together
teststep.data: comps full price http://prototypedev11.llbean.com/r58/comps/PDP15.jpg Rage sale-full price http://prototypedev11.llbean.com/r58/comps/PDP15sale2.jpg Note: in the comp price appears within parenthesis but parenthesis were removed.
teststep.result: - Pricing will be communicated to the right of each product within the BOL - For the Full price Item the pricing displays: $xx.xx - For the Range Sale-Full the pricing will be communicated as a range from the lowest price to the highest price -Savings display in red i.e item with 2 pricepoints $xx.xx - $xx.xx Save $xx.xx (xx%) Item with 3 pricepoints $xx.xx -*$xx.xx* Save up to $xx.xx (xx%) - For the bundle item with the Range Sale-Full price the color swatches that are grouped as Full price will have a label displayed as "Color" plus the price next to it and for Redlines and Sale price points the label displayed is "Sale Color" plus the price next to it for both.

teststep.step: For the item that has the range sale-full price select an available sku that is in full price
teststep.result: -Range will change to a single Full Price $xx.xx

teststep.step: For the same item select an available sku that belongs to the lowest Sale price
teststep.result: - Full price will no longer display - Range will change to a single Sale Price $xx.xx $xx.xx Save $x.xx (xx%)

execution.testSummary: PDP Metrics - Item Selection

teststep.step: Click on ItemId other than default
teststep.result: - Check pev2 variable, it should have the following value pev2: ppTabSelect

teststep.step: Navigate to Product Page which has multiple item ids in dropdown selection, Click on attribute to trigger ItemId other than default
teststep.result: - Check pev2 variable, it should have the following value pev2: ppTabSelect

teststep.step: Hover over another selection that would trigger another ItemId but do NOT click
teststep.result: - No tag data request is sent

execution.testSummary: PDP Metrics - Product Attribute Engagement

teststep.step: Select the first attribute it should be In-stock and Full price i.e waist
teststep.data: prop9 variable Format c9:attribute:attribute_value:Pricepoint:Availability:Orderable Attribute i.e waist, color, etc Attribute_value i.e red, yellow FP : Full Price Availability i.e IN = In-stock, BO = Backordered, etc Is item Orderable? i.e N =Not Orderable, Y = orderable
teststep.result: - Check prop9 variable (c9 in some debuggers) - Variable should have the following values c9: Waist:34in:FP:IN:N - Atribute value in prop9 matches with the one selected in the Product Page. - Item is not orderable yet since not all the attributes have been selected

teststep.step: Select the second attribute i.e Inseam
teststep.result: - Check prop9 variable - Variable should have the following values c9: Inseam:30in:FP:IN:N - Atribute value in prop9 matches with the one selected in the Product Page. - Item is not orderable yet since not all the attributes have been selected

teststep.step: Select the third attribute i.e Color
teststep.result: - Check prop9 variable - Variable should have the following values c9: Color/Style:Khaki:FP:IN: Y - Atribute value in prop9 matches with the one selected in the Product Page. - Item is orderable since all the attributes have been selected

teststep.step: Select all attributes, make sure color is on SALE
teststep.result: - Check prop9 variable - Variable should have the following values c9: Color/Style:Azure/Light Gray Heather: OP: IN:Y

teststep.step: Select all attributes, make sure color is Backordered
teststep.result: - Check prop9 variable - Variable should have the following values c9: Color/Style:Azure/Light Gray Heather: FP: BO:Y

teststep.step: Select a limited quantities color
teststep.result: - Check prop9 variable - Variable should have the following values c9: Color/Style:Azure/Light Gray Heather: FP: LQ:Y

teststep.step: Select a sold out color
teststep.result: - Check prop9 variable - Variable should have the following values c9: Color/Style:Azure/Light Gray Heather: FP: OUT : Y

teststep.step: Hover over a color attribute
teststep.result: - No data is captured for hovering over the color selection

teststep.step: Run query in mainframe DB
teststep.data: select a.CNTRY_ID, a.CNTRY_SRC_CD, a.IPADDR, a.PROMO_CNSNT_TYP_CD from qprod.AA076AT_EMADDRHIST a where a.EMAIL_ADDR_ID IN (select EMAIL_ADDR_ID from qprod.AA030AT_EMAIL_ADDR where EMAIL_ADDR = UPPER('EMAIL')) with ur;
teststep.result: - CASL data points are stored - Country Code = Country the account was created from - Country Source = Source of country code (if AU {B = Billing Address} else{I = IP Address} ) - Consent Type: Explicit

execution.testSummary: Product Page - Item Availability: Backordered - Size and color level (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: On Page load
teststep.result: - Add to Bag button is enable - Online availability message will not display until customer reaches a SKU level - Delivery Information zone (ADQ) will be available to enter a zip code

teststep.step: Open the size dropdown
teststep.result: - Size completely Backordered will append "Backordered" label within the dropdown - Size that is not entirely Backordered won't append that label.

teststep.step: Select the size that is not completely Backordered
teststep.result: - Size dropdown won't append a "Backordered" label.

teststep.step: Open the size dropdown again and select the size that is completely Backordered
teststep.result: - Size dropdown will append a "Backordered" stock status label.

teststep.step: Hover over a Backordered
teststep.result: - Next to the color name the stock status message will display within parentheses but will not set it until the user clicks on the color swatch i.e Color: Olive Gray (Backordered)

teststep.step: Select a Backordered color and the remaining of the attributes
teststep.result: - Color name will now append the "Backordered" label and this label is removed from the Size dropdown. - Add to Bag button is still enable - The Online Availability message will be displayed i.e Online Availability: Backordered - Delivery Information zone (ADQ ) will say: Order now; item is scheduled to ship by Monday, April 20, 2015

teststep.step: Add item to Bag and click on "Continue Shopping" button
teststep.result: - Item attributes will reset - Online availability message will not display until customer reaches a SKU level - Delivery Information zone (ADQ) will be available to enter a zip code

execution.testSummary: Product Page - Item Availability: Backordered - No Size Range (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.result: - Size won't append a "Backordered" stock status label

teststep.step: Open Width dropdown
teststep.result: - Width with all colors backordered will append a "Backordered" stock status label

teststep.step: Select the width that has all color backordered
teststep.result: - Width will append a Backordered stock status label within the dropdown - Add to Bag button is enable - The Online Availability message is not displayed yet since we haven't reach the sku level - Delivery Information zone will be available to enter a zip code (no Backordered message until reaching the sku level)

teststep.step: Select a Backordered color
teststep.result: - Color name will now append the "Backordered" label and this label is removed from the Width dropdown. - Add to Bag button is still enable - The Online Availability message will be displayed i.e Online Availability: Backordered - Delivery Information zone (ADQ ) will say: Order now; item is scheduled to ship by Monday, April 20, 2015

teststep.step: Add this item to Wish List and click on "Continue Shopping" button
teststep.result: - Item attributes will reset - Online availability message will not display until customer reaches a SKU level - Delivery Information zone (ADQ) will be available to enter a zip code

execution.testSummary: Navigation toolbar area label

teststep.step: View page source code and look for the utility-nav tag
teststep.data: more details about screen reader can be found here https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Accessibility
teststep.result: Aria label for the utility-nav tag should looks like the following line <nav class="utility-nav" aria-label="toolbar">

teststep.step: Using a screen reader active, reload the Home Page and listen carefully for the navigation bar instructions
teststep.result: Navigation toolbar should be announced as "Toolbar Navigation"

execution.testSummary: Verify BC parameter is displayed added to categories links(with alternate paths) in RON. (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Mouse Hover over the Link (setup by the user) in RON Col1.
teststep.data: 1. Outdoor Gear -> Knives & Tools 2. Outdoor Gear-> Featured -> Outdoor Toys & Games
teststep.result: - URL displayed at the bottom of the browser window has BC parameter included. E.g. 1. http://www.llbean.com/llb/shop/508816?page=knives-and-tools& bc=97 &nav=gnro-0 2. http://ecwebq12.llbean.com/llb/shop/510940? bc=474-634 - BC parameter has ID(s) of the department under which link is displayed.

teststep.step: Click on the link
teststep.result: - User is directed to the SUB1 category page.

teststep.step: Replace SHOP in the URL path with GNAJAX and hit enter.
teststep.result: - GNAJAX response is displayed in JSON Format.

teststep.step: Scroll down to the bottom of the GNAJAX response and verify isDefaultPath property value.
teststep.result: - isDefaultPath property is displayed with false value. E.g. isDefaultPath: false

teststep.step: Verify userPathIds property values in GNAJAX response.
teststep.result: - userPathIds has IDs of the path taken by the user. E.g. Department ID, Sub 1 ID - userPathIds are different than the defaultPathIds.

teststep.step: Verify defaultPathIds property values in GNAJAX response.
teststep.data: Get the default path ids from the PB
teststep.result: - defaultPathIds has IDs of the default path to the page. E.g. Default Department ID, Sub 1 ID - defaultPathIds are different than the userPathIds. - defaultPathIds is same as displayed in default path of the page in PB.

teststep.step: Verify metricPathIds property values in GNAJAX response.
teststep.result: - metricPathIds values are same as userPathIds values.

execution.testSummary: PAU for New Account Cookie Verification

teststep.step: Create an account

teststep.step: Close & Reopen browser
teststep.result: - User is recognized as PAU - global header and welcome message display for PAU - LLBLS is no longer present - LLBWELCOME is still populated - LLBOI is still populated - LLBLOGIN cookie is still populated

teststep.result: - Gear Up for Your Trip section is displayed. - Following product's info is displayed: Name Price. - No items displayed are duplicated - More than 1 item per activity displayed.

teststep.step: Click on a Product
teststep.result: - User is brought to Product's page - feat=parkfinder -id is displayed on the URL

teststep.step: Add item to Shopping Bag
teststep.result: - User is able to add item to SB

execution.testSummary: Click to Chat - UI & functionality (Desktop)

teststep.step: Open Chat Hover on Customer Service in Global Header Click on Chat (On tablet tap on CS in GH then select Chat from the CS page)
teststep.result: Chat pop up opens with the three fields (Name, Email, Question) and the Connect Button at the bottom

teststep.step: Populate Chat pre-screen Enter information required (Name, Email Address) Start entering characters into the Question field Leave the chat screen open & go back to the product page, to get the name of a product (go back to PDP browser session on tablet) Return back to the chat screen and complete entering characters in question field.
teststep.result: Once connected to the active chat sessions, there are no additional tabs Able to go back to the chat screen and the text previously entered still displays

teststep.step: Click the Connect button
teststep.result: The chat screen displays and the text previously entered at the question field is shown. Able to interact with Customer Service reps sending and receiving messages. (might need additional coordination)

teststep.step: Close window using the X
teststep.result: After Selecting x to close session, you receive the Chat has ended window messaging Pop up Closes

teststep.step: Click Connect without populating data on Name, Email and Question fields
teststep.result: There will be a message for each field: Name - "Please enter your name" Email - "Please enter a valid email address" Question - "Please enter a question"

teststep.step: "Pro-Active Offer Accepted & Single Offer Per Session *Invoke 2 consecutive null search results
teststep.result: A pop-up providing assistance will display with two options: No, Thanks Chat Now

teststep.step: "Pro-Active Offer Accepted & Single Offer Per Session Select "No, Thanks" from pro-active chat
teststep.result: The pop-up will close

teststep.step: "Pro-Active Offer Accepted & Single Offer Per Session Select "Chat Now" from pro-active chat
teststep.result: Chat pop up opens with the three fields (Name, Email, Question) and the Connect Button at the bottom

teststep.step: "Pro-Active Offer Accepted & Single Offer Per Session Navigate away from configured page and then try to invoke pro-active chat from any applicable location ( Null Search,Easy Returns, or Product Pgs)
teststep.result: No Pro-Active Chat offer displalys

teststep.step: "Pro-Active Offer Accepted & Single Offer Per Session Close & reopen browser Invoke Pro-active chat offer from any applicable location (Easy Returns, Null Search or Product Pgs)
teststep.result: Pro-active chat offer displays and able to interact

execution.testSummary: Utility Navigation - Log in link / Guest User / 731px and above(Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Check the Log in link
teststep.result: - Log in link will be located first from right to left - There will be NO "Create an Account link" next to the Log in link

teststep.step: Select the Log in link
teststep.result: - Selecting the Log In link will prompt the Secure Login pop-in layer

teststep.step: Enter a valid Email Address and Password
teststep.result: - Log in link will be replaced by the word Welcome plus the customer’s first name (the first name as set in the Billing Address) Welcome, First Name

teststep.step: Click on the First Name link
teststep.result: - The link will display in a selected state. - A menu will display beneath the link with the following My Account links [First Name]’s Account Wish list Order History Log Out

teststep.step: Click on the Log Out link
teststep.result: - Selecting Log Out will reset the customer state to an unidentified visitor - Log in link will appear again on the right

execution.testSummary: ParkFinder - Park details page - Facebook Share

teststep.step: Click on Facebook Share icon
teststep.result: - Page is shared with individual or group (depending on how many people shared with)

teststep.step: Navigate to Facebook inbox for recipient
teststep.result: Message displays in recipient's FB message inbox

teststep.step: Click on posted link to return to LLB
teststep.result: Link returns to L.L.Bean Park Finder details page

execution.testSummary: Search Breadcrumb Refinements - Search in multiple departments (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Enter a Search Term that has results in multiple departments
teststep.result: Verify: - Breadcrumb displays within H1 tag - Breadcrumb displays selected refinement(s) after lowest category at end of breadcrumb with an 'X' - Refinements are appended to the breadcrumb in the order selected - Refinements append from left to right and wrap as needed - Selecting departments and sub-depts updates the URL - Selecting/de-selecting refinements and categories updates the URL with the selection (e.g.http://www.llbean.com/llb/search/?freeText=alpine&init=1*&gnrefine=1*SIZE*10%5E1*FBRC*Synthetic%5E*) - Brought to the search results page - Brought to Dept within Search results

teststep.step: Select a Department
teststep.result: Breadcrumb displays with search term and dept selected (ex: Search results for: "shirts" > Women's)

execution.testSummary: Quick View - Product Page (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Quick View an item with more than one product attribute i.e size, color Select a non-default tab i.e Petite Make the attribute selections Click on the Link "Show more details"
teststep.result: - Brought to the Product page with the selections retained

execution.testSummary: Product Page - Item with Alterations

teststep.step: Go to a Product Page eligible for alterations i.e inseam, waist
teststep.result: - Customer will be presented with Waist dropdown Inseam information which has Radio buttons for: No cuffs, Cuffs and Unfinished - Inseam Length dropdown will be displayed below the radio buttons - By default for cuff type: "Cuffs" will be pre-selected - By default for inseam, there will be no selection. The drop-down window will present messaging "Please Select" indicating the customer must make a selection.

teststep.step: Click on No Cuffs option and select an inseam lenth
teststep.result: -Inseam Lenght dropdown still displays

teststep.step: Click on Unfinished option
teststep.result: - Inseam Lenght dropdown will disappear -All content below that Inseam Length drop-down box will shift up to fill the space

teststep.step: Click on "Cuffs" again
teststep.result: -Inseam Length selected on "No Cuffs" will be maintained on "Cuffs" selection.

teststep.step: Having the value for Inseam Length click on "Unfinshed" and after that click again on "No Cuffs" and "Cuffs" radio buttons
teststep.result: -Selecting "Unfinished" causes the inseam drop-down to disappear -After selecting "Cuffs" and "No Cuffs" the previously selected inseam length value will display in the re-appeared inseam drop-down

teststep.step: Add this item to Bag
teststep.result: Item is added correctly to bag

execution.testSummary: Left Nav Refinement Interaction - Add/Remove/Add (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Select 2 color refinements from left nav
teststep.result: - Refinements are multi-select - (clear) displays after the refinement label - Only thumbnail swatches in the selected color families are displayed - Thumbnail image is updated to the 1st alphabetic color in the last selected color family the item is available in (e.g. red selected, swatches include Bright Red, Apple Red, Candy Apple Red, etc, sorted and displayes in alphabetic order - Apple Red, Bright Red, Candy Apple Red) - Result set is refined based on selected color refinements

teststep.step: Remove 1st selected color refinement
teststep.result: - Thumbnail results are updated to only display items available in the remaining selected color family (e.g. black)

teststep.step: Select 2 more color refinements
teststep.result: - Thumbnail results are updated to only include items with available colors in the selected color families (e.g. black, red, green)

teststep.result: - Fields are dispalyed blank and RU's information is not displayed from My Account in the RIO form.

execution.testSummary: Product Page - Add to Wish List as GU (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Select attributes and click 'Add to Wish List' link
teststep.result: - Wish List login layer is displayed. Verify: - Item is NOT added/moved to Wish List yet

teststep.step: Enter customer's login information in WL login layer and Click 'Log in' btn
teststep.result: - User is able to login to the site - Page refreshes after successful login - User is recognized as RU - Post Add to Wish List layer (PAWL) is displayed centered within the viewable page - Layer header is: "Added to Your Wish List" - Product information displays: Thumbnail image in color selected (linked to product page) Product name (linked to product page) Size Color/Style Width/Length, etc Price Quantity Services/Alterations Stock Status Big "Close X" displays in upper right corner - Continue Shopping & Go to Wish List buttons display - Financials, promotional messaging and savings, CHTML zones do NOT display - PAWL does NOT have a timer and will remain open until manually closed - Wish List count is updated - LLBOI cookie has correct item count for WL and SB - LLBOIG cookie is not created

teststep.result: - In-store availability: Choose another store Wayside Retail Store 6 Wayside Road Burlington, MA 888-552-9866 - on the right of the store information In Stock (4 available) RESERVE (button)

execution.testSummary: Product Page - RU Add to Wish List + Error Messages (Desktop)

teststep.step: Click Add To Wish List link
teststep.data: See comp for Error Message display: http://ecprotodev01.llbean.com/r58/comps/PDP15_Error_wish.jpg
teststep.result: - Pop-over error message is displayed next to the ATWL link communicating which attributes require selections prior adding it to Wish List More information is needed.Please Select: o Attribute1 o Attribute2 - On Error Message attributes are listed in same order as they are displayed on Product Page - Error message will be displayed below the unselected attributes: 'Please Select attribute name'

teststep.result: - Pop-over error message is no longer displayed near ATWL link

execution.testSummary: Search Compare items retained across multiple result pages and refinements (Desktop, Tablet)

teststep.step: Hover over Add to compare link
teststep.result: - Hovering over text displays a link and becomes underlined

teststep.step: Add 1 item to compare from 1st page of results
teststep.result: - Page does Not refresh as items are added to widget - Compare widget is hidden until an item is added, then it is displayed at the bottom of the viewing window (right aligned) - Compare button displays to the right of the widget after first item has been added - Minimum of 1 item can be compared - "Remove" link display below the item added to compare

teststep.step: Navigate to second page of results Add second item to compare from second page of results
teststep.result: - Item is added left to right in the next available slot in the widget in the order in which it was selected - All items added display the mini thumbnail image of the product (excluding overlay image) - Items are retained in compare widget when displaying additional products within the same result set

teststep.step: Enter a New Search Term Add more item(s) to compare
teststep.result: - Items added on both a Original Search results page and on New Search results page display on the Compare layer - Maximum of 4 items can be compared

teststep.step: Select another refinement filter
teststep.result: All items added to the Compare widget are retained

teststep.step: Click Compare Button
teststep.result: - Compare layer is diplayed

teststep.step: Click Close Window
teststep.result: - Compare layer closes when clicking the Close window link (x) - Search Results page becomes active - Search Results displays in same state (refinements, sort options, compare items retained)

execution.testSummary: Home Page needs to be accessible

teststep.result: Screen reader should be able to read the components and messages. (Including title, H tags, fields, buttons, etc)

teststep.step: Navigate the page using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.)
teststep.result: - Users should be able to properly navigate using keyboard - Focus using the keyboard should be visually identificable

execution.testSummary: My account forms needs to be accesible

teststep.step: Using a screen reader, access the My Account page
teststep.data: More details can be found here https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=29393125
teststep.result: - User has click into the My Account linkScreen reader should be able to read the components and messages. (Including title, H tags, fields, buttons, etc) - User has click into the My Account linkMake sure ‘aria-describedby=”[helperTextID]”’ tag is present for password field and validation message

teststep.step: Using a contrast checker tool, validate the contrast ratio
teststep.data: You can use "WCAG Contrast Checker" FF extension
teststep.result: Regular text and images of regular text MUST have a contrast ratio of at least 4.5 to 1 with the background

teststep.step: Navigate the page using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.)
teststep.result: - User has click into the My Account linkUsers should be able to properly navigate using keyboard - User has click into the My Account linkFocus using the keyboard should be visually identificable

teststep.result: Screen reader should be able to read the components and messages. (Including title, H tags, fields, buttons, etc)

teststep.step: Using a contrast checker tool, validate the contrast ratio
teststep.data: You can use "WCAG Contrast Checker" FF extension

execution.testSummary: Bundles - BOL Footer Pricing /No discount for Bundle (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Click on "buy together" button
teststep.data: Note: The single price will be dynamic and will be based on the lowest possible price of both items together, based on the current attribute selections (e.g. if one of the products has the Misses item ID selected, no other attribute has been selected for that item yet, and there are sale colors available, the total bundle price will be based on the lowest available sale price within that item, plus the other product's price)
teststep.result: - The combined lowest SELL price for both products is displayed with the word "from": Buy Together: from $XX.XX - No offer details link is displayed below the second product

execution.testSummary: Secondary/Alternate Items - Add to Bag (Desktop)

teststep.step: Scroll down to see the Secondary/Alternate Items
teststep.result: - Each product will display in a horizontal arrangement - Multiple secondary products will stack vertically within the secondary product zone - Each secondary product will have an Add to Bag button/action available - The Item # won't be displayed on Secondary Products. - Attributes (color, size, etc) are displayed for individual item. - Each product functions as an independent "product page" - Each secondary product will list the product's name - Each secondary product will display an image of the product (default image will be the item's main image) - Social, Shipping Info and RIO links are NOT available on secondary items - Secondary items do not display Customer Reviews

teststep.step: For one alternate Item select a sku that is sold out
teststep.data: Use the Stock Setter to make things sold out : http://ecbatp/cgi-bin/db_maintenance/updtSkuInv.cgi
teststep.result: - Add to Bag button will display in its inactive state (gray color and label "SOLD OUT") - Add to Wish List link will dissapear

teststep.step: For the same Item select now a sku that is available (in-stock)
teststep.result: - Add to Bag button will display in its active state (orange color and label "ADD TO BAG")

teststep.step: Hover over the Add to Bag button
teststep.result: - The active state of the Add to Bag button will have a hover state

teststep.step: Select all attributes for the other alternate products, update the quantity = 3 and Add to Bag only one of them.
teststep.result: - 3 Secondary/Alternate Items will be added to the Shopping Bag - PASB layer will be displayed within the same page. - All selections made on the item added to bag will be reset to default state -There will be no affect on attribute selections made on other Secondary/alternate items on the product page(no clearing/resetting)/

execution.testSummary: Wish List - Remove Items (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Remove 1 item by clicking on Remove Item link (link displays at the right of the product)
teststep.result: - "Removing" animation displays - Removing an item does NOT cause a page refresh (unless last item removed) - Removed item is no longer visible - Other items move up, space is not reserved -Item count in global header decrements by 1 - Item count in page title decrements by 1 - LLBOI cookie count is updated

teststep.step: Click on Remove all items link (below the last item in WL).
teststep.result: - "SLAP" layer launches Are you sure you want to remove all items from your Wish List? Keep Items and Remove all Items buttons display

teststep.step: Click on Keep items button.
teststep.result: - Items are NOT removed from Wish List

teststep.step: Click again on Remove all items link (below the last item in WL). and in the SLAP layer Click on Remove all items button.
teststep.result: - SLAP layer closes - "Removing" animation does NOT display - Page refreshes and Empty Wish List displays (Items are removed from Wish List) - Page header displays with customer first and last name - No item count displays - Print link does display - Social and Email sharing links do not display - Instructional text displays There are no items on your Wish List Add items while shopping by clicking the "Add to Wish List" button on any product page - Remove All link does not display on empty WL page

execution.testSummary: SEO verification checklist - Product pages

teststep.step: Verify on Product Pages Schematic - Reviews Go to any product page Open view page source Control + F Search for schema.org/aggregateRating
teststep.result: 1. itemprop should match with "aggregateRating" Example: <article class="product-reviews" itemprop="aggregateRating" 2. Check itemscope has itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" Example: itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating"> 3. Check itemprop= "itemReviewed" is not empty Example: itemprop="itemReviewed">L.L.Bean Original Book Pack 4. On meta content should have itemprop="worstRating", itemprop="ratingValue" and itemprop="bestRating" 5. Check itemprop="reviewCount should not be empty

teststep.step: Verify on Product Pages Schematic - Product Go to any product page Open view page source Control + F Search for schema.org/Product
teststep.result: 1. Check itemscope has itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" 2. Itemprop has itemprop="name" and should not be empty Example: <h1 class="product-header" itemprop="name"> Camp Sleeping Bag, Flannel-Lined 40° </h1> 3. Itemprop has itemprop="productID" and should not be empty Example: <span itemprop="productID">TA284582</span>

teststep.step: Verify on Product Pages Verify Analytics scripts Open view page source Control + F Search for userPath
teststep.result: JS variables should be present: userPath userPathIds metricPathIds preDMHPath preDMHPathIds defaultPath defaultPathIds

teststep.step: Verify on Product Pages Crosslinking Widget Links "similar products & similar searches" Open view page source Control + F Search for cat-related-info
teststep.result: Should be present links for "similar products & similar searches" Example: <div id="cat-related-info"> <div class="ri-title"> <h4>Similar Products & Similar Searches</h4>

teststep.step: Verify on Product Pages Smart SEO Go to any product page Open view page source Control + F Search for smartSeo
teststep.result: Should be present links for smartSEO Example: <div id="smartSeo">

Itemtype has a schema Offer Example <tr itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Event"> 2.Meta itemprop price, pricecurrency, url are displaying and are not empty Example <meta itemprop="price" content="375"> <meta itemprop="pricecurrency" content="USD"> <meta itemprop="url" content="http://www.llbean.com/llb/event/83656?page=androscoggin-river-fishing-trip"></div>

execution.testSummary: Product Page - Item Pricing - Range Sale-Full Price

teststep.step: Go to a Product Page where one of the Item_Ids (i.e petite, regular) has 3 different price points i.e $22.95, $19.99, $14.99
teststep.data: comp http://prototypedev11.llbean.com/r58/comps/PDP15sale2.jpg Note: in the comp price appears within parenthesis but parenthesis were removed.
teststep.result: - Price will be communicated as a range from the lowest price to the highest price -Display savings in red with the words Save up to and the highest $ savings the customer can get - Also the highest % savings is displayed. $xx.xx - $xx.xx Save up to $xx.xx (xx%) - For Full price colors swatches the label displayed is "Color" plus the price next to it. - For Redlines and Sale price points the label displayed is "Sale Color" plus the price next to it for both.

teststep.step: Select an available sku that is in full price
teststep.result: -Range will change to a single Full Price $xx.xx

teststep.step: Select an available sku that belongs to the lowest Sale price
teststep.result: - Full price will no longer display - Range will change to a single Sale Price $xx.xx $xx.xx Save $x.xx (xx%)

teststep.step: Select an available sku that belongs to the highest Sale price
teststep.result: - Range keeps as a single Sale Price $xx.xx $xx.xx Save $x.xx (xx%)

execution.testSummary: SEO verification checklist - All Pages

teststep.step: Verify Title tag Search for <title>
teststep.result: Title tag should be present in all pages Example: <title>L.L.Bean: FREE Shipping. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed. </title>

teststep.step: Verify Meta Description Search for name="description"
teststep.result: Meta Description should be present in all pages Example: <meta name="description" content="Shop L.L.Bean for Free Shipping on clothing, shoes, outdoor gear and more, all backed by our 100% satisfaction guarantee.">

teststep.step: Verify Meta Keywords Tag Search for name="keywords"
teststep.result: Meta Keywords Tag should be present in all pages Example: <meta name="keywords" content="L.L.Bean, Free Shipping, Outdoor Gear, Satisfaction Guarantee, Clothing, Shoes, Hunting, Fishing, Luggage, L.L.Bean">

teststep.step: Verify H1 tag Search for H1
teststep.result: Should be only one H1 per page in all pages Example: <h1>Men's</h1>

teststep.step: Verify Graph Description Search for meta property="og: Search for meta property="fb:app_id
teststep.result: On graph description should be there: Image Title Type Site_Name fb:app_id Note: Image is present only on PDP pages

teststep.step: Verify Canonical Link Element Search for rel="canonical
teststep.result: Canonical link present in all pages Example: <link rel="canonical" href="http://www.llbean.com">

teststep.step: Verify Mobile Tagging Search for rel="alternate"
teststep.result: Not always 1 for 1 at the moment, there are some pages that don't have mobile pages and some that don't have desktop pages If it's a desktop only page, won't have a rel=alternate tag Example: <link rel="alternate" href="http://m.llbean.com/index.html" />

teststep.step: Check in All Pages - Mobile Mobile Tagging On desktop emulate mobile site(developer tools) Open view source Control + F Search for rel="canonical"
teststep.result: Canonical tag should be pointing to corresponding page on desktop Exception: if it's a mobile only page, won't have rel=canonical tag pointing to desktop Example: <link rel="canonical"href="http://www.llbean.com"/

execution.testSummary: Login need to be accesible

teststep.data: You can use "WCAG Contrast Checker" FF extension
teststep.result: Regular text and images of regular text MUST have a contrast ratio of at least 4.5 to 1 with the background

X mark is removed and new icon (red ! icon) is displayed next to the message -Focus using the keyboard is visually identifiable -Screen reader reads the error and validation messages correctly

execution.testSummary: Bundles - Bundle Order Layer/No discount for Bundle/Add to Bag (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Selected "Buy Together" button
teststep.result: - https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Glossary launches in the center of the screen as a modal pop-in window - Both items display in a horizontal, stacked manner -Each product will display the items available for selection (i.e Petite, Regular, etc) -Each product will display its product attributes same as the Product Page (i.e color, size, etc) -Each product will display its product price, apart from the bundle price - Primary product will be the top-most item in the bundles layer - Recommended Product will be displayed below the Primary product -Each product will display the name of the product -Each product will display the image designated as the main image. -Each product will have a quantity indicator - No alternate views will display within the bundles layer -There will be no ability to zoom in/out of the image within the bundles layer -ADQ will NOT display for products within the bundles layer -RIO functionality will not be available within the bundles layer - A single Add to Bag button is displayed per Bundle ordering layer

execution.testSummary: Search Breadcrumb Refinements - Search and Attribute refinement (Tablet)

teststep.result: Verify: - All displayed refinements show in Collapsed State (max of 10) - Attributes displayed are correct based on the department - Counts reflect the number of available products for the attribute - Open (+) / Close toggle (-) is displayed for each refinement - Categories (Sub depts) do not have a toggle - Refinements are appended to the lowest category in the breadcrumb in the order they were selected - Orderable attributes are presented as swatches (e.g. color, size, waist, inseam, etc) - Selected orderable attributes display with bold, orange border - Selected refinements display in breadcrumb followed by an 'X', in the order they were selected - Once an attribute is selected for any refinement group, (reset all) is displayed to the right of the Filter label - Refinements displayed in breadcrumb match refinements selected in left nav - Number of items available in header, left nav refinements, and cat header update based on refinements selected

teststep.result: - Message displays below Add item to bag to customize and preview your monogram

teststep.step: Select continue shopping
teststep.result: - PASB closed - User is returned to product page - Count in global header is updated to 1

teststep.step: Select continue shopping, go to e-gift card page, complete required fields and add to bag
teststep.result: - PASB is displayed with the e-gift card information

teststep.step: Select continue shopping, go to physical gift card page, complete require fields and add to bag
teststep.result: - PASB is displayed with the e-gift card information

teststep.step: Select checkout
teststep.result: - User is taken to shopping bag - Financial information is correct: Total Before Savings: is total of the before-savings price for the items L.L.Bean Visa Savings: -$8.00 3 Items in Bag Item in Bag price is the total of the after-savings price for the items Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal is displayed with the total of the after-savings price for the items Est. Tax: is correct for address - Total Savings on This Order: $8.00 displays below Order Summary

teststep.step: Select continue to checkout
teststep.result: - Taken to ORS page - Financial information is correct: Total Before Savings: is total of the before-savings price for the items L.L.Bean Visa Savings: -$8.00 3 Items in Bag Item in Bag price is the total of the after-savings price for the items Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total of the after-savings price for the items Tax: displays correct for address Balance to be applied to <payment method> shows correct order total - Total Savings on This Order: $8.00 displays below Order Summary

teststep.step: Select Add L.L.Bean Visa Coupon link
teststep.result: - Taken to Payment page

teststep.step: Select show list of coupons link
teststep.result: - List of vailable coupons for account are displayed

teststep.step: Select Redeem for any available coupon
teststep.result: - Coupon is now displayed with a checkmark and Remove link - Financials are updated to include: L.L.Bean Visa Coupons: and coupon amount as payment

teststep.step: Select Save and Continue

teststep.data: Boat and Tote Bag, (open top or zip top) Men's polo's
teststep.result: - Main product image is displayed - Swatches are displayed for product attributes - A checkbox with Add a monogram text and (details) link display to the right of the quantity selector: Add Monogram ( details ) - The checkbox is unchecked (FALSE) by default - Add to Bag button displays - Add to Wish List link displays - ADQ displays below order options box - RIO displays below ADQ

teststep.step: Select the Monogramming checkbox
teststep.result: - Message displays below Add item to bag to customize and preview your monogram

teststep.step: Make attribute selections
teststep.result: - ADQ section updates with specific date - RIO section updates with select store link

teststep.step: Click on Add to Bag button
teststep.result: - Taken to ADD YOUR MONOGRAM page

teststep.step: Complete required information and click on Save Monogram
teststep.result: - PASB is displayed showing item with the configured monogram information.

teststep.step: Select continue shopping
teststep.result: - PASB closes - User is returned to product page - Count in global header is updated to 1

teststep.step: Select continue shopping, go to e-gift card page, complete required fields and add to bag
teststep.result: - PASB is displayed with the e-gift card information

teststep.step: Select continue shopping, go to physical gift card page, complete require fields and add to bag
teststep.result: - PASB is displayed with the e-gift card information

teststep.step: Select checkout
teststep.result: - User is taken to shopping bag - Financial information is correct: 3 Items in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the items Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total price for the items

teststep.step: Select continue to checkout, and select checkout as a guest
teststep.result: - Taken to Shipping Information page - Financial information is correct: 3 Items in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the items Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total price for the items

teststep.step: Complete required fields and select Continue to Billing Address
teststep.result: - Taken to Billing Address page - Financial information is correct: 3 Items in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the items Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total for the items

teststep.step: Complete required fields and select Continue to Payment Options
teststep.result: - Taken to Payment Options page - Financial information is correct: 3 Items in Bag Item in Bag price is the total of the price for the items Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total for the items Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

teststep.step: Enter valid LLBean visa card information, select I have a coupon to add, enter valid LLBean Visa coupon information and select Redeem
teststep.result: - Coupon displays with Remove link and checkmark - Financials are updated: L.L.Bean Visa Coupons: with coupon amount Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is updated to reflect new total

teststep.step: Select Continue to Review Order
teststep.result: - Taken to ORS page - Financial information is correct: * Total Before Savings: is total of the before-savings price for the items L.L.Bean Visa Savings: -$8.00 3 Items in Bag Item in Bag price is the total of the after-savings price for the items Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total of the after-savings price for the items Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address L.L.Bean Visa Coupons: and coupon amount as payment Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total - Total Savings on This Order: $8.00 displays below Order Summary

execution.testSummary: Guest - ODS Free & Paid Event Reservations, Searching for ODS events, Event Calendar (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Select a free event from the event calendar
teststep.result: - Taken to the correct Reservation layer for the free event selected

teststep.step: Complete required fields and select Save the Date
teststep.result: - Thank you layer is displayed

teststep.step: Close thank you layer
teststep.result: - Shopping bag count in global header does not update

teststep.step: Search for any ODS activity
teststep.data: e.g. Snowshoe, canoeing, kayaking, biking, etc
teststep.result: - Search results page displays Events for and associated products for search term - Quick view and Add to Compare functionality are not available for ODS Events

teststep.step: Click on an Event image for a paid event that has multiple dates and times available
teststep.result: - Taken to the correct Event page - Nothing is prefilled Date, Time and Number of Participants fields are low lit and inactive Start Your Reservation is inactive

teststep.step: Select a location with mulitple dates available
teststep.result: - Event Location displays City and State - Date selection becomes active - Time and Participant dropdowns are still low lit and inactive

teststep.step: Select a date
teststep.result: - Only current and future dates are selectable - Date selected shows in Date field - Helper text displays below the Date drop-down Day of the week, date, year - Time selection becomes active

teststep.step: Select a time
teststep.result: - Selected time displays in drop-down field - Location block displays below the AV images with the specific location for the selected Event occurance - Number of spots available for that occurence displays below the Number of Participants box - Number of Participants becomes active and is defaulted to Select

teststep.step: Select Number of Participants
teststep.result: - Number of participants options are equal to or less than the number of spots available - Number selected displays in drop-down - Start Your Reservation button becomes active

teststep.step: Complete all required fields and select Add to Bag
teststep.result: - PASB displays with correct event information

teststep.step: Select Continue Shopping
teststep.result: - PASB closes - Returned to ODS event page - Shopping Bag count in global header is updated to reflect ODS event

teststep.step: Go to ODS lander page
teststep.result: - Left nav displays a list of activity links - Event Calendar displays with horizontal drop down filters for: Date Events near Event type Skill Level Price - Link to clear all filter selections - List of activities and their associated events display below the calendar

teststep.step: Expand Locations filter
teststep.result: - Locations are arranged alphabetically by state - Cities within the state are arranged alphabetically

teststep.step: Go to the shopping bag
teststep.result: - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total price for the item

teststep.step: Select continue to checkout, and select checkout as a guest
teststep.result: - Taken to Billing Address page - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total price for the item

teststep.step: Complete required fields and select Continue to Payment Options
teststep.result: - Taken to Payment Options page - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total of the price for the item Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total for the item Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

teststep.step: Enter valid credit card information and select Continue to Review Order
teststep.result: - Taken to ORS page - Correct ODS event information is displayed - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total price for the item Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

teststep.step: Select Place Your Order
teststep.result: - Thank you page is displayed - Correct ODS event information is displayed - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total price for the item Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

execution.testSummary: Purchase History - Basic Purchase Verification & Return (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Select Track Order in Footer
teststep.result: - Purchase History & Order Tracking page is displayed

teststep.step: On Summary Page, select View Details for any order which has Purchased From: Retail status
teststep.result: - Order Details page displays with: Links for Return to Purchase History (top and bottom) Date of transaction with Order status = COMPLETE Item status = FILLED Purchased from = store name Financials display Shipping and Handling: FREE Subtotal: Tax: Returns: Refunded Tax/Duty: <Payment Method> Change (for cash payment method) or Balance Due (for credit card payment method): Item Information is displayed: Item # Qty Description Services (if available) Color Size Cost -Thumbnail image - Product name - Item ID - Item price - Qty purchased - BUY ANOTHER button below thumbail image

teststep.step: Select Return to Purchase History link
teststep.result: - User is returned to Purchase History & Order Tracking page

teststep.step: Select View Details for any order which has Return Status
teststep.result: -Date of transaction with Order status (COMPLETE for order, FILLED for item) -Purchased from data (store name) -Balanced Due = $0.00 -Item level Status = RETURNED

teststep.step: Select Return to Purchase History link
teststep.result: - User is returned to Purchase History & Order Tracking page

teststep.step: Select any product displayed in purchase history
teststep.result: - Product page for item is displayed

teststep.step: Select back button
teststep.result: - Returned to Purchase History & Order Tracking page

teststep.step: Select View Details for any order that does not have a Return status
teststep.result: - Order Details page is displayed

teststep.step: Select Need to return an item?
teststep.result: - Returns & Exchanges | Easy Returns & Exchanges page is displayed

teststep.step: Select Print a Return and Exchange Form
teststep.result: - Return and Exchange form pdf is opened

teststep.step: Return to Returns & Exchanges | Easy Returns & Exchanges page and select Prepaid label for US or Puerto Rico
teststep.result: - Complete the Form to Print a US Prepaid Label page is displayed - Fields are prefilled with account information

teststep.step: Select UPS Shipping Option and select Preview Shipping Label
teststep.result: - Print a UPS Return Shipping Label page is displayed - Customer address is displayed in top left corner of label - L.L.Bean address is displayed below SHIP TO:

execution.testSummary: Guest - ODS Free & Paid Event Reservations, Searching for ODS events, Event Calendar (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Select a free event from the event calendar
teststep.result: - Taken to the correct Reservation layer for the free event selected

teststep.step: Complete required fields and select Save the Date
teststep.result: - Thank you layer is displayed

teststep.step: Close thank you layer
teststep.result: - Shopping bag count in global header does not update

teststep.step: Search for any ODS activity
teststep.data: e.g. Snowshoe, canoeing, kayaking, biking, etc
teststep.result: - Search results page displays Events for and associated products for search term - Quick view and Add to Compare functionality are not available for ODS Events

teststep.step: Click on an Event image for a paid event that has multiple dates and times available
teststep.result: - Taken to the correct Event page - Nothing is prefilled Date, Time and Number of Participants fields are low lit and inactive Start Your Reservation is inactive

teststep.step: Select a location with mulitple dates available
teststep.result: - Event Location displays City and State - Date selection becomes active - Time and Participant dropdowns are still low lit and inactive

teststep.step: Select a date
teststep.result: - Only current and future dates are selectable - Date selected shows in Date field - Helper text displays below the Date drop-down Day of the week, date, year - Time selection becomes active

teststep.step: Select a time
teststep.result: - Selected time displays in drop-down field - Location block displays below the AV images with the specific location for the selected Event occurance - Number of spots available for that occurence displays below the Number of Participants box - Number of Participants becomes active and is defaulted to Select

teststep.step: Select Number of Participants
teststep.result: - Number of participants options are equal to or less than the number of spots available - Number selected displays in drop-down - Start Your Reservation button becomes active

teststep.step: Complete all required fields and select Add to Bag
teststep.result: - PASB displays with correct event information

teststep.step: Select Continue Shopping
teststep.result: - PASB closes - Returned to ODS event page - Shopping Bag count in global header is updated to reflect ODS event

teststep.step: Go to ODS lander page
teststep.result: - Left nav displays a list of activity links - Event Calendar displays with horizontal drop down filters for: Date Events near Event type Skill Level Price - Link to clear all filter selections - List of activities and their associated events display below the calendar

teststep.step: Expand Locations filter
teststep.result: - Locations are arranged alphabetically by state - Cities within the state are arranged alphabetically

teststep.step: Go to the shopping bag
teststep.result: - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total price for the item

teststep.step: Select continue to checkout, and select checkout as a guest
teststep.result: - Taken to Billing Address page - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total price for the item

teststep.step: Complete required fields and select Continue to Payment Options
teststep.result: - Taken to Payment Options page - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total of the price for the item Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total for the item Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

teststep.step: Enter valid credit card information and select Continue to Review Order
teststep.result: - Taken to ORS page - Correct ODS event information is displayed - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total price for the item Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

teststep.step: Select Place Your Order
teststep.result: - Thank you page is displayed - Correct ODS event information is displayed - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total price for the item Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

teststep.step: Select continue to checkout, and select checkout as a guest

teststep.step: Complete required fields and select Continue to Payment Options

teststep.step: Enter valid credit card information and select Continue to Review Order
teststep.result: - Taken to ORS page - Correct ODS event information is displayed - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total price for the item Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

teststep.step: Select Place Your Order
teststep.result: - Thank you page is displayed - Correct ODS event information is displayed - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total price for the item Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

teststep.step: Select a free event from the event calendar
teststep.result: - Taken to the correct Reservation layer for the free event selected

teststep.data: e.g. Snowshoe, canoeing, kayaking, biking, etc

teststep.step: Click on an Event image for a paid event that has multiple dates and times available

teststep.result: - Selected time displays in drop-down field - Location block displays below the AV images with the specific location for the selected Event occurance - Number of spots available for that occurence displays below the Number of Participants box - Number of Participants becomes active and is defaulted to Select

teststep.step: Select Number of Participants
teststep.result: - Number of participants options are equal to or less than the number of spots available - Number selected displays in drop-down - Start Your Reservation button becomes active

teststep.step: Complete all required fields and select Add to Bag
teststep.result: - PASB displays with correct event information

teststep.step: Select Continue Shopping
teststep.result: - PASB closes - Returned to ODS event page - Shopping Bag count in global header is updated to reflect ODS event

teststep.step: Go to ODS lander page
teststep.result: - Left nav displays a list of activity links - Event Calendar displays with horizontal drop down filters for: Date Events near Event type Skill Level Price - Link to clear all filter selections - List of activities and their associated events display below the calendar

teststep.step: Expand Locations filter
teststep.result: - Locations are arranged alphabetically by state - Cities within the state are arranged alphabetically

teststep.step: Go to the shopping bag
teststep.result: - Financial information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total price for the item

teststep.step: Select continue to checkout, enter valid password and continue
teststep.result: - Taken to ORS page - Correct ODS event information is displayed - Financial information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total price for the item Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

teststep.step: Select Place Your Order
teststep.result: - Thank you page is displayed - Correct ODS event information is displayed - Financial information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total price for the item Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

teststep.result: -Date of transaction with Order status (COMPLETE for order, FILLED for item) -Purchased from data (store name) -Balanced Due = $0.00 -Item level Status = RETURNED

teststep.result: - Message displays below Add item to bag to customize and preview your monogram

teststep.step: Make attribute selections

teststep.step: Complete required information and click on Save Monogram

teststep.step: Select continue shopping
teststep.result: - PASB closed - User is returned to product page - Count in global header is updated to 1

teststep.step: Select continue shopping, go to e-gift card page, complete required fields and add to bag
teststep.result: - PASB is displayed with the e-gift card information

teststep.step: Select continue shopping, go to physical gift card page, complete require fields and add to bag
teststep.result: - PASB is displayed with the e-gift card information

teststep.step: Select checkout
teststep.result: - User is taken to shopping bag - Financial information is correct: Total Before Savings: is total of the before-savings price for the items L.L.Bean Visa Savings: -$8.00 3 Items in Bag Item in Bag price is the total of the after-savings price for the items Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal is displayed with the total of the after-savings price for the items Est. Tax: is correct for address - Total Savings on This Order: $8.00 displays below Order Summary

teststep.step: Select continue to checkout
teststep.result: - Taken to ORS page - Financial information is correct: Total Before Savings: is total of the before-savings price for the items L.L.Bean Visa Savings: -$8.00 3 Items in Bag Item in Bag price is the total of the after-savings price for the items Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total of the after-savings price for the items Tax: displays correct for address Balance to be applied to <payment method> shows correct order total - Total Savings on This Order: $8.00 displays below Order Summary

teststep.result: - Taken to Payment page

teststep.step: Select show list of coupons link
teststep.result: - List of vailable coupons for account are displayed

teststep.step: Select Redeem for any available coupon
teststep.result: - Coupon is now displayed with a checkmark and Remove link - Financials are updated to include: L.L.Bean Visa Coupons: and coupon amount as payment

teststep.step: Select Save and Continue
teststep.result: - Taken to ORS page - Financials are updated to include: L.L.Bean Visa Coupons: and coupon amount as payment - Balance to be applied to <payment method> reflect application of coupon

execution.testSummary: Promo Rel type displays on Shopping bag

teststep.step: Navigate to Shopping bag
teststep.data: Two conditions will be used to decide whether or not the Promo rel type has to be rendered for a given item: (1.) no SKU for the item should have a markdown (meaning that none of the SKU's active prices should have precedence=1) and (2.) the page from which the item was added must have an active P0 rel type.
teststep.result: All items in shopping bag display correctly Promo Rel Type displays message: “Note: This item is not eligible for promotional discounts.” for full priced item enabled in PB Promo Rel Type message does not display on any other items in the Shopping bag

teststep.step: Navigate to ORS
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type displays correctly on ORS for enabled full priced item

teststep.step: Check out to Thank you
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type displays correctly on Thank You for enabled full priced item

execution.testSummary: Promo Rel Type does not display on Shopping Bag

teststep.step: Navigate to Sale product page where Promo Rel Type has been enabled
teststep.data: Two conditions will be used to decide whether or not the Promo rel type has to be rendered for a given item: (1.) no SKU for the item should have a markdown (meaning that none of the SKU's active prices should have precedence=1) and (2.) the page from which the item was added must have an active P0 rel type.
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type does not display on Sale product page

teststep.step: Navigate to Shopping Bag
teststep.result: All items in Shopping Bag display correctly Promo Rel Type does not display for Sale items on Shopping Bag

teststep.step: Navigate to Thank you
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type does not display for sale items on ORS or Thank you page

execution.testSummary: Custom Product - Clicking on Popular combinations Images (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Tap/Click on any of the Popular Combinations images
teststep.result: Dynamic main image changes according to selection

teststep.step: Open up each accordion section
