execution.testSummary: Promo Rel type displays on Shopping bag

teststep.step: Navigate to Shopping bag
teststep.data: Two conditions will be used to decide whether or not the Promo rel type has to be rendered for a given item: (1.) no SKU for the item should have a markdown (meaning that none of the SKU's active prices should have precedence=1) and (2.) the page from which the item was added must have an active P0 rel type.
teststep.result: All items in shopping bag display correctly Promo Rel Type displays message: “Note: This item is not eligible for promotional discounts.” for full priced item enabled in PB Promo Rel Type message does not display on any other items in the Shopping bag

teststep.step: Navigate to ORS
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type displays correctly on ORS for enabled full priced item

teststep.step: Check out to Thank you
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type displays correctly on Thank You for enabled full priced item

execution.testSummary: Promo Rel Type does not display on Shopping Bag

teststep.step: Navigate to Sale product page where Promo Rel Type has been enabled
teststep.data: Two conditions will be used to decide whether or not the Promo rel type has to be rendered for a given item: (1.) no SKU for the item should have a markdown (meaning that none of the SKU's active prices should have precedence=1) and (2.) the page from which the item was added must have an active P0 rel type.
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type does not display on Sale product page

teststep.step: Navigate to Shopping Bag
teststep.result: All items in Shopping Bag display correctly Promo Rel Type does not display for Sale items on Shopping Bag

teststep.step: Navigate to Thank you
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type does not display for sale items on ORS or Thank you page

execution.testSummary: Product Page (guest) - Services: Single Engraving - RIO, ADQ, Add to Bag, Checkout (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Go to a product page eligible for Engraving
teststep.result: - A checkbox will be present under the quantity selector on tablet - beside the selector on desktop with a details link Add Engraving ( details ) - The checkbox will be unchecked (FALSE) by default - RIO zone is displayed below the ADQ area In-Store availability: Select options (ex.: size or color)

teststep.step: Select the details link
teststep.result: - Pop-over will be displayed with the engraving information on desktop - separate tab on tablet

teststep.step: Make attribute selections, select zip code in ADQ zone, enter a different zip code, and select Submit
teststep.result: - City for newly entered zip code is displayed - Order now and receive by day, date/time is updated for new location - RIO zone updates to: In - Store availability: Select store

teststep.step: Check the Engraving checkbox
teststep.result: - A message below the quantity selector and Engraving checkbox will be displayed Add item to bag to customize your engraving - Order now and receive by is updated to reflect additional time for services

teststep.step: Select select store link, select a store from the list and select Check Store
teststep.result: - In Stock availability for selected store is displayed

teststep.step: Select Reserve
teststep.result: - RIO Reservation layer is displayed with Engraving Message: Engraving Services for this item are available only online, by phone or at our Freeport, Maine, Flagship Store. If you wish reserve this item for pickup in Freeport, you will be able to have your item personalized when you arrive at the store.

teststep.step: Complete required fields and select RESERVE ITEM
teststep.result: - RIO confirmation layer is displayed

teststep.step: Close layer and select Add to Bag button
teststep.result: - Taken to Engraving services page

teststep.step: Enter Engraving configuration and select Continue
teststep.result: - PASB is displayed with correct pricing, style (letters & case) - Shopping bag count in global header is updated

teststep.step: Select Checkout
teststep.result: - Item is displayed in shopping bag with engraving information - Engraving service amount is displayed in item detail - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item plus the engraving service Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total price for the item plus the engraving service

teststep.step: Select continue to checkout and select Checkout as a guest
teststep.result: - Shipping Information page is displayed - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item plus the engraving service Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total price for the item plus the engraving service

teststep.step: Complete required fields and select Continue to Billing Address
teststep.result: - Billing Address page is displayed - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item plus the engraving service Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total price for the item plus the engraving service

teststep.step: Complete required fields and select Continue to Payment Options
teststep.result: - Payment Options page is displayed - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total of the price for the item plus the engraving service Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total for the item plus the engraving service Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

teststep.step: Enter valid credit card information and select Continue to Review Order
teststep.result: - ORS page is displayed - Correct item with engraving information is displayed - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item plus the engraving service Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total price for the item plus the engraving service Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

teststep.step: Select Place Your Order
teststep.result: - Thank you page is displayed - Correct item with engraving information is displayed - Order Summary information is correct: 1 Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item plus the engraving service Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal is displayed with the total price for the item plus the engraving service Tax: is displayed correctly for shipping address Balance to be Applied to Credit Card: is displayed with order total

execution.testSummary: GC - Ordering physical Gift Card (Mobile App & Mobile Web)
execution.versions: R65-Rapid Fix Gift Card Message Interface

teststep.step: Select GIFT CARD
teststep.result: - Breadcrumb trail displays without page specific name (ex: L.L.Bean > Gift cards) -Send e-Gift Card link displays to the right -Add to Wish List link displays below Add to Shopping Bag button

teststep.step: Select Card Design, complete all fields and click Add to Bag
teststep.result: PASB displays with: - Gift Card dynamic image & product short description display - Card Value & Quantity are correct

teststep.step: Go to Shopping Bag
teststep.result: GC displays in Shopping Bag with: - Correct Item # is displayed - Delivery information displays below stock status - Gift Card Message displays - Qty is able to be edited - Move to Wish list feature is enabled

teststep.step: Checkout and proceed to ORS page
teststep.result: GC displays on ORS page with: - Shipping Method for Gift Card shows FREE for Gift Cards - Gift Message displays - Correct Item # is displayed

teststep.step: Proceed to Thank You page
teststep.result: GC displays on Thank You page with: - Correct Item # is displayed - Gift Card message displays

execution.testSummary: EGC - Message helper text (Mobile App & Mobile Web)
execution.versions: R65-Rapid Fix Gift Card Message Interface

teststep.step: Scroll down to ADD A PERSONAL MESSAGE text field.
teststep.result: - Helper text displays in the text field: up to 4 lines, 30 characters each

execution.testSummary: GC - Message Contiguous character limit (Mobile App & Mobile Web)
execution.versions: R65-Rapid Fix Gift Card Message Interface

teststep.step: Attempt to enter more than 30 characters (No spaces) into the ADD A PERSONAL MESSAGE text field

execution.testSummary: GC - Message character countdown (Mobile App & Mobile Web)
execution.versions: R65-Rapid Fix Gift Card Message Interface

teststep.step: Scroll down to ADD A PERSONAL MESSAGE text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count is not displayed

teststep.step: Tap on ADD A PERSONAL MESSAGE text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count displays 120 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter a message into line 1 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count decreases by 1 for every character entered.

teststep.step: Delete the text from line 1 one character at a time until cursor is at the beginning of the line
teststep.result: - Character count increases by 1 for every character deleted - Character count is back to 120

teststep.step: Tap return on the device keyboard
teststep.result: - Cursor is at the beginning of line 2 - Character count displays 90 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter a message into line 2 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count decreases by 1 for every character entered.

teststep.step: Delete the text from line 2 one character at a time until cursor is at the beginning of the line
teststep.result: - Character count increases by 1 for every character deleted - Character count is back to 90

teststep.step: Tap return on the device keyboard
teststep.result: - Cursor is at the beginning of line 3 - Character count displays 60 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter a message into line 3 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count decreases by 1 for every character entered.

teststep.step: Delete the text from line 3 one character at a time until cursor is at the beginning of the line
teststep.result: - Character count increases by 1 for every character deleted - Character count is back to 60

teststep.step: Tap return on the device keyboard
teststep.result: - Cursor is at the beginning of line 4 - Character count displays 30 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter a message into line 4 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count decreases by 1 for every character entered.

teststep.step: Delete the text from line 4 one character at a time until cursor is at the beginning of the line
teststep.result: - Character count increases by 1 for every character deleted - Character count is back to 30

execution.testSummary: EGC - Today Deliver On Date Through Checkout (Mobile App & Mobile Web)
execution.versions: R65-Rapid Fix Gift Card Message Interface

teststep.step: Populate all mandatory and optional fields leaving Deliver On Date set to Today's Date and tap Add to Bag
teststep.result: - PASB displays: Card Value Quantity (always set to 1) Email to (recipient name, recipient email address) Deliver on (in the format <day of week>, <month> DD, YYYY)

teststep.step: Tap Checkout from PASB to go to Shopping Bag
teststep.result: - Added EGC displays: Item (ex TZ240003 By Email) Card Value (ex. $50.00) Stock Status (ex. In Stock) Deliver on date (format <day of the week>, <month> DD, YYYY) Gift Card message Email to (recipient name, recipient email)

teststep.step: Checkout and proceed to ORS
teststep.result: - Added EGC displays: Item (ex TZ240003 By Email) Card Value (ex. $50.00) Stock Status (ex. In Stock) Deliver on date (format <day of the week>, <month> DD, YYYY) Gift Card message Email to (recipient name, recipient email)

teststep.step: Submit order and proceed to Thank You page
teststep.result: - Added EGC displays: Item (ex TZ240003 By Email) Card Value (ex. $50.00) Stock Status (ex. In Stock) Deliver on date (format <day of the week>, <month> DD, YYYY) Gift Card message Email to (recipient name, recipient email)

execution.testSummary: GC - Message line wrap counter (Mobile App & Mobile Web)
execution.versions: R65-Rapid Fix Gift Card Message Interface

teststep.step: Tap on ADD A PERSONAL MESSAGE text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count displays 120 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter 30 characters (including spaces) on line 1 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Cursor wraps to line 2 - Character count displays 90 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter 30 characters (including spaces) on line 2 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Cursor wraps to line 3 - - Character count displays 60 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter 30 characters (including spaces) on line 3 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Cursor wraps to line 4 - Character count displays 30 characters remaining

teststep.step: Attempt to enter more than 30 characters on line 4
teststep.result: - User is not able to enter more than 30 characters on line 4 - Character count displays 0 characters remaining

teststep.step: Clear all text from text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count displays 120 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter less than 30 characters on line 1 of the text entry box and tap return on device keyboard
teststep.result: - Character count displays 90 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter less than 30 characters on line 2 of the text entry box and tap return on device keyboard
teststep.result: - Character count displays 60 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter less than 30 characters on line 3 of the text entry box and tap return on device keyboard
teststep.result: - Character count displays 30 characters remaining

teststep.step: Clear all text from text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count displays 120 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter more than 30 characters (including spaces) starting in line 1 until the last word wraps to line 2
teststep.result: - Count reflects number of characters wrapped to line 2 (90 - number of characters on line 2)

teststep.step: Enter more than 30 characters (including spaces) starting in line 2 until the last word wraps to line 3
teststep.result: - Count reflects number of characters wrapped to line 3 (60 - number of characters on line 3)

teststep.step: Enter more than 30 characters (including spaces) starting in line 3 until the last word wraps to line 4
teststep.result: - Count reflects number of characters wrapped to line 4 (30 - number of characters on line 4)

teststep.result: - Added EGC displays: Item (ex TZ240003 By Email) Card Value (ex. $50.00) Stock Status (ex. In Stock) Deliver on date (format <day of the week>, <month> DD, YYYY) Gift Card message Email to (recipient name, recipient email)

teststep.step: Checkout and proceed to ORS
teststep.result: - Added EGC displays: Item (ex TZ240003 By Email) Card Value (ex. $50.00) Stock Status (ex. In Stock) Deliver on date (format <day of the week>, <month> DD, YYYY) Gift Card message Email to (recipient name, recipient email)

teststep.step: Submit order and proceed to Thank You page
teststep.result: - Added EGC displays: Item (ex TZ240003 By Email) Card Value (ex. $50.00) Stock Status (ex. In Stock) Deliver on date (format <day of the week>, <month> DD, YYYY) Gift Card message Email to (recipient name, recipient email)

teststep.step: Scroll down to ADD A PERSONAL MESSAGE text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count is not displayed

teststep.step: Tap on ADD A PERSONAL MESSAGE text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count displays 120 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter a message into line 1 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count decreases by 1 for every character entered.

teststep.step: Delete the text from line 1 one character at a time until cursor is at the beginning of the line
teststep.result: - Character count increases by 1 for every character deleted - Character count is back to 120

teststep.step: Tap return on the device keyboard
teststep.result: - Cursor is at the beginning of line 2 - Character count displays 90 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter a message into line 2 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count decreases by 1 for every character entered.

teststep.step: Delete the text from line 2 one character at a time until cursor is at the beginning of the line
teststep.result: - Character count increases by 1 for every character deleted - Character count is back to 90

teststep.step: Tap return on the device keyboard
teststep.result: - Cursor is at the beginning of line 3 - Character count displays 60 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter a message into line 3 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count decreases by 1 for every character entered.

teststep.step: Delete the text from line 3 one character at a time until cursor is at the beginning of the line
teststep.result: - Character count increases by 1 for every character deleted - Character count is back to 60

teststep.step: Tap return on the device keyboard
teststep.result: - Cursor is at the beginning of line 4 - Character count displays 30 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter a message into line 4 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count decreases by 1 for every character entered.

teststep.step: Delete the text from line 4 one character at a time until cursor is at the beginning of the line
teststep.result: - Character count increases by 1 for every character deleted - Character count is back to 30

execution.testSummary: EGC - Today Deliver On Date Through Checkout (Mobile App & Mobile Web)
execution.versions: R65-Rapid Fix Gift Card Message Interface

teststep.step: Populate all mandatory and optional fields leaving Deliver On Date set to Today's Date and tap Add to Bag
teststep.result: - PASB displays: Card Value Quantity (always set to 1) Email to (recipient name, recipient email address) Deliver on (in the format <day of week>, <month> DD, YYYY)

teststep.step: Tap Checkout from PASB to go to Shopping Bag
teststep.result: - Added EGC displays: Item (ex TZ240003 By Email) Card Value (ex. $50.00) Stock Status (ex. In Stock) Deliver on date (format <day of the week>, <month> DD, YYYY) Gift Card message Email to (recipient name, recipient email)

teststep.step: Checkout and proceed to ORS
teststep.result: - Added EGC displays: Item (ex TZ240003 By Email) Card Value (ex. $50.00) Stock Status (ex. In Stock) Deliver on date (format <day of the week>, <month> DD, YYYY) Gift Card message Email to (recipient name, recipient email)

teststep.step: Submit order and proceed to Thank You page
teststep.result: - Added EGC displays: Item (ex TZ240003 By Email) Card Value (ex. $50.00) Stock Status (ex. In Stock) Deliver on date (format <day of the week>, <month> DD, YYYY) Gift Card message Email to (recipient name, recipient email)

execution.testSummary: GC - Message line wrap counter (Mobile App & Mobile Web)
execution.versions: R65-Rapid Fix Gift Card Message Interface

teststep.step: Tap on ADD A PERSONAL MESSAGE text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count displays 120 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter 30 characters (including spaces) on line 1 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Cursor wraps to line 2 - Character count displays 90 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter 30 characters (including spaces) on line 2 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Cursor wraps to line 3 - - Character count displays 60 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter 30 characters (including spaces) on line 3 of the text entry box
teststep.result: - Cursor wraps to line 4 - Character count displays 30 characters remaining

teststep.step: Attempt to enter more than 30 characters on line 4
teststep.result: - User is not able to enter more than 30 characters on line 4 - Character count displays 0 characters remaining

teststep.step: Clear all text from text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count displays 120 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter less than 30 characters on line 1 of the text entry box and tap return on device keyboard
teststep.result: - Character count displays 90 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter less than 30 characters on line 2 of the text entry box and tap return on device keyboard
teststep.result: - Character count displays 60 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter less than 30 characters on line 3 of the text entry box and tap return on device keyboard
teststep.result: - Character count displays 30 characters remaining

teststep.step: Clear all text from text entry box
teststep.result: - Character count displays 120 characters remaining

teststep.step: Enter more than 30 characters (including spaces) starting in line 1 until the last word wraps to line 2
teststep.result: - Count reflects number of characters wrapped to line 2 (90 - number of characters on line 2)

teststep.step: Enter more than 30 characters (including spaces) starting in line 2 until the last word wraps to line 3
teststep.result: - Count reflects number of characters wrapped to line 3 (60 - number of characters on line 3)

teststep.step: Enter more than 30 characters (including spaces) starting in line 3 until the last word wraps to line 4
teststep.result: - Count reflects number of characters wrapped to line 4 (30 - number of characters on line 4)

execution.testSummary: GC - Ordering physical Gift Card (Mobile App & Mobile Web)
execution.versions: R65-Rapid Fix Gift Card Message Interface

teststep.step: Select GIFT CARD
teststep.result: - Breadcrumb trail displays without page specific name (ex: L.L.Bean > Gift cards) -Send e-Gift Card link displays to the right -Add to Wish List link displays below Add to Shopping Bag button

teststep.step: Select Card Design, complete all fields and click Add to Bag
teststep.result: PASB displays with: - Gift Card dynamic image & product short description display - Card Value & Quantity are correct

teststep.step: Go to Shopping Bag
teststep.result: GC displays in Shopping Bag with: - Correct Item # is displayed - Delivery information displays below stock status - Gift Card Message displays - Qty is able to be edited - Move to Wish list feature is enabled

teststep.step: Checkout and proceed to ORS page
teststep.result: GC displays on ORS page with: - Shipping Method for Gift Card shows FREE for Gift Cards - Gift Message displays - Correct Item # is displayed

teststep.step: Proceed to Thank You page
teststep.result: GC displays on Thank You page with: - Correct Item # is displayed - Gift Card message displays

execution.testSummary: GC - Ordering physical Gift Card (Mobile App & Mobile Web)

teststep.step: Select GIFT CARD
teststep.result: - Breadcrumb trail displays without page specific name (ex: L.L.Bean > Gift cards) -Send e-Gift Card link displays to the right -Add to Wish List link displays below Add to Shopping Bag button

teststep.result: PASB displays with: - Gift Card dynamic image & product short description display - Card Value & Quantity are correct

teststep.step: Go to Shopping Bag
teststep.result: GC displays in Shopping Bag with: - Correct Item # is displayed - Delivery information displays below stock status - Gift Card Message displays - Qty is able to be edited - Move to Wish list feature is enabled

teststep.step: Checkout and proceed to ORS page
teststep.result: GC displays on ORS page with: - Shipping Method for Gift Card shows FREE for Gift Cards - Gift Message displays - Correct Item # is displayed

teststep.step: Proceed to Thank You page
teststep.result: GC displays on Thank You page with: - Correct Item # is displayed - Gift Card message displays

teststep.result: - Added EGC displays: Item (ex TZ240003 By Email) Card Value (ex. $50.00) Stock Status (ex. In Stock) Deliver on date (format <day of the week>, <month> DD, YYYY) Gift Card message Email to (recipient name, recipient email)

teststep.step: Submit order and proceed to Thank You page
teststep.result: - Added EGC displays: Item (ex TZ240003 By Email) Card Value (ex. $50.00) Stock Status (ex. In Stock) Deliver on date (format <day of the week>, <month> DD, YYYY) Gift Card message Email to (recipient name, recipient email)

execution.testSummary: Custom Product - Clicking on Main Image Sections (Desktop)

teststep.step: Verify on Custom Product page
teststep.result: - Dynamic main image displays left aligned below the Product name/Selling Headline

teststep.step: Hover over Custom Boat and Tote Image
teststep.result: - Hand Pointer is displayed when hovering Custom Boat and Tote - Different sections of the image are highlighted as they are hovered (i.e: When hovering over handles they are highlighted)

teststep.step: Click/Tap on any of the Custom Boat and Tote sections in the image
teststep.result: - Appropriate accordion section is expanded (i.e: When clicking/tapping on Custom Boat and Tote body 'Body Color' section of the accordion is expanded)

teststep.step: Open up each accordion section
teststep.result: - Accordion headers display pre-selected value

teststep.step: Tap/Click on any of the Popular Combinations images (above the accordion)
teststep.result: - Dynamic main image changes according to selection

execution.testSummary: Custom Product - Promotional Discount Applied (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Configure Product with all attributes including the optional ones and Add to bag
teststep.result: PASB displays correct price with discount applied Savings Message $ and % off display in red below price i.e. $49.95 $39.95 You Save $9.96 (10%)

teststep.step: Complete checkout to Thank You page
teststep.result: Pricing includes promotional discount savings

execution.testSummary: Custom Product - To Order Box (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Select Monogram Checkbox
teststep.result: Sub-Total doesn't change when checkbox is selected "Add item to bag to customize and preview your monogram" message is presented

teststep.step: Un-check monogram checkbox
teststep.result: Checkbox returns to default state Subtotal does not change when monogram checkbox is unchecked

teststep.step: Select custom attributes Select Monogram checkbox and Add to Bag
teststep.result: Brought to the Monogram page with the dynamic image displayed (as it was configured)

teststep.step: Complete all required fields Select Save Monogram
teststep.result: PASB layer displays Custom Tote with correct attributes and Monogram details Configurator (on PDP which is low lit) is reset to the default selections

teststep.step: Continue through checkout
teststep.result: Correct attributes and monogram display on ORS and Thank You pages

teststep.result: Price & Item number for selected configurations are changed to: Item# 288568 Price: $44.95

teststep.step: Add to bag and complete checkout to Thank You page
teststep.result: Image corresponding to selections made on Custom Product page are displayed appropriately on PASB, SB, ORS and Thank You Pricing & Item # are correct

execution.testSummary: PayPal Express - Guest user add Gift Card & Promo in Shopping Bag (Desktop & Tablet)

teststep.step: Select +Add Promo Code, enter a valid Gift Card number & PIN and select Redeem
teststep.result: - Applied Gift card information is displayed in widget - Order Summary information is correctly updated: n Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total price for the item Gift Cards: <amount of gift card> is displayed Est. Balance*: is total price minus gift card payment for the items

teststep.step: Select +Add Another Promo Code, enter a valid promotion code and select Redeem
teststep.result: - Applied Promotion code information is displayed in the widget - Order Summary information is correctly updated: Total Before Savings: is total of the before-savings price for the items Merchandise Savings: is total of the after-savings price for the items n Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Est. Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Est. Subtotal* is displayed with the total price for the item Gift Cards: <amount of gift card> is displayed Est. Balance*: is total after-savings price minus gift card payment for the items

teststep.step: Select checkout with Paypal, complete PayPal login and Continue
teststep.result: - ORS page is displayed - Order Summary information is correct: Total Before Savings: is total of the before-savings price for the items Merchandise Savings: is total of the promotional savings for the items n Item in Bag Item in Bag price is the total price for the item Shipping and Handling is displayed as FREE Subtotal: is total after-savings price for the items Tax: is displayed correctly for the shipping address Order total: is total after-savings price plus applicable tax for the items Gift Cards: <amount of gift card> is displayed as payment Balance to be Paid via PayPal: is total after-savings price plus applicable tax minus gift card payment for the items

execution.testSummary: Shop Menu Shop All (Mobile Web)
execution.versions: R65-Mweb Presentation of Broader Range of Products

teststep.step: Tap on a department i.e. Men's
teststep.result: - Department categories are displayed - Shop All (department's name) displayed i.e. Shop All Men's - Link for shop all departments displayed

teststep.step: Tap on the shop all link
teststep.result: Department's lander page displayed

teststep.step: Tap on shop menu
teststep.result: - Department categories are displayed - Shop All (department's name) displayed i.e. Shop All Men's - Link for shop all departments displayed

teststep.step: Tap on a category that has sub-categories. i.e. Shirts
teststep.result: - Sub-categories displayed - Shop All (category's name) displayed i.e. Shop All Shirts - Links for shop all departments and previously selected department displayed

teststep.step: Tap on the shop all link
teststep.result: Product list page for that category displayed

teststep.step: Tap on shop menu
teststep.result: - Sub-categories displayed - Shop All (category's name) displayed i.e. Shop All Shirts - Links for shop all departments and previously selected department displayed

teststep.step: Tap on a sub-category that has sub2-categories i.e. Button-down
teststep.result: - Sub2-categories displayed - Shop All (sub-category's name) displayed i.e. Shop All Button-Down - Links for shop all departments and previously selected department and category

teststep.step: Tap on the shop all link
teststep.result: Product list page for that sub-category displayed

teststep.step: Tap on shop menu
teststep.result: - Sub2-categories displayed - Shop All (sub-category's name) displayed i.e. Shop All Button-Down - Links for shop all departments and previously selected department and category

teststep.step: Tap previously selected category
teststep.result: - Sub-categories displayed - Shop All (category's name) displayed i.e. Shop All Shirts - Links for shop all departments and previously selected department

teststep.step: Tap previously selected department
teststep.result: - Department categories are displayed - Shop All (department's name) displayed i.e. Shop All Men's - Link for shop all departments displayed

teststep.step: Tap shop all departments
teststep.result: - List of departments displayed

execution.testSummary: Change Email, Password & Opt In and Clear Stored Credit Card(Desktop & Tablet)
execution.components: Edit Account,Email,Fraud Prevention,Opt In/Opt Out,Password,Registered User,Stored Card

teststep.step: Click My Profile in left nav
teststep.result: - My Profile page is displayed - Email Address block is not masked, but has option to expand - Password is displayed and masked with option to expand - Security Question block is displayed with option to expand and Security Answer masked

teststep.step: Expand the Email Address section in the My Profile page.
teststep.result: - Messaging is displayed on page: *Note:* For your security, changing your email address will delete any saved credit card information from your online account information. - Prefilled email Address and Re-enter Email Address fields are displayed in an editable state - Opt-in checkbox is selected/de-selected based on account opt in/opt out settings in mainframe - Password and Security Question sections are visible in read-only state with option to expand

teststep.step: Modify the Email Address on the account, re-enter the new e-mail address, change the opt in selection and click Cancel
teststep.result: - Returned to My Profile page - Email address is NOT updated - Original Email address is displayed as read only with Edit link available.

teststep.step: Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the original email address
teststep.result: - Your L.L.Bean Email Address Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Requirements?preview=/http%3A%2F%2Fprototype11.llbean.com%2FS16%2Fs16_Projects%2Fs16_Email%2FS16_0323_EMailChangeNotification%2FS16_0323_EMAILChangeNotification.jpg has not been received

teststep.step: Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the new email address
teststep.result: - Your L.L.Bean Email Address Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Requirements?preview=/http%3A%2F%2Fprototype11.llbean.com%2FS16%2Fs16_Projects%2Fs16_Email%2FS16_0323_EMailChangeNotification%2FS16_0323_EMAILChangeNotification.jpg has not been received

teststep.step: Expand the Email Address section in the My Profile page.
teststep.result: - Opt in/Opt out is selected based on original account opt in/opt out setting on mainframe

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile | Email Settings page
teststep.result: - Subscribe/Unsubscribe is selected based on original opt in/out setting on mainframe

teststep.step: Go to Payment Methods page
teststep.result: - The previously stored credit card has been retained on the account

teststep.step: Go to My Profile page, modify the Email Address on the account, re-enter the new e-mail address and click Update
teststep.result: - Email address is successfully updated - Email address is now displayed as read only with Edit link available.

teststep.step: Go to Payment Methods page
teststep.result: - The previously stored credit card has been removed

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile and expand Password section
teststep.result: - Email address and Security Question are still displayed as read only - All Password fields are displayed in an editable state Current Password New Password Re-enter New Password

teststep.step: Modify password and click Update
teststep.result: - Password is updated - Password section is collapsed

teststep.step: Log out and log in again
teststep.result: - The new email address will be prefilled on the login dialog. - User is able to log in successfully with the new email address and password

teststep.step: Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the original email address
teststep.result: - Your L.L.Bean Email Address Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Requirements?preview=/http%3A%2F%2Fprototype11.llbean.com%2FS16%2Fs16_Projects%2Fs16_Email%2FS16_0323_EMailChangeNotification%2FS16_0323_EMAILChangeNotification.jpg has been received - Your L.L.Bean Password Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has not been received

teststep.step: Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the new email address
teststep.result: - Your L.L.Bean Email Address Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Requirements?preview=/http%3A%2F%2Fprototype11.llbean.com%2FS16%2Fs16_Projects%2Fs16_Email%2FS16_0323_EMailChangeNotification%2FS16_0323_EMAILChangeNotification.jpg has been received - Your L.L.Bean Password Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=70484014 on mainframe for original email address
teststep.result: - EMAIL_PROMO_FLAG reflects original opt in/opt out value setting on mainframe

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=70484014 against ecom database for original email address
teststep.result: - No records are returned

execution.testSummary: SEO verification checklist - Department Pages - Source code

teststep.step: Verify H1 Search <h1>
teststep.result: Breadcrumb should be present on any department page Example <div class="row breadcrumb-page-level" itemprop="breadcrumb"> <a href=http://www.llbean.com>L.L.Bean</a><span>></span><a display='guidednav.jsp' href='/llb/shop/27?page=womens'>Women's</a> </div>

teststep.step: Verify Related site maps Search for sitemaps
teststep.result: Site map present on each department page, there may be a link to more than 1 sitemap and that's ok Example: <div id="sitemaps"> <div class="sm-title">Related Site Maps</div> <ul class="sm-list"> <li class="sm-item"><a href="/llb/sitemap/1002?page=womens=clothing-sitemap" title="Women's Clothing Site Map | Free Shipping at L.L.Bean ">Women's Clothing Site Map</a></li> </ul> </div>

execution.testSummary: Security Question/Answer - Password validation of updates

teststep.step: Select a different security question and click Update
teststep.result: - Security Answer & Password inline validation messages: Please enter an answer to your security question Please enter a password. - New selected security question is displayed - Security Answer is blank (empty)

teststep.step: Select a different security question, enter a security answer, enter an invalid password and click Update
teststep.result: - Inline field validation message: The password you entered does not match the password we have on record. Please try again. - Password field is cleared - New selected security question is displayed - New security answer is displayed

teststep.step: Select a different security question, enter a security answer, enter a valid password and click Update
teststep.result: - Question and answer are successfully updated - User is returned to default view of My Profile page - Newly selected Security Question displays

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated fields show Security Question and/or Answer only - There is no update date/timestamp

execution.testSummary: SEO verification checklist - All Pages - Mobile tagging

teststep.step: Check Mobile Tagging Search rel="canonical"
teststep.result: Canonical tag should be pointing to corresponding page on desktop Exception: if it's a mobile only page, won't have rel=canonical tag pointing to desktop Example: <link rel="canonical"href="http://www.llbean.com"/

execution.testSummary: CS Password Reset - Valid data input (Desktop)

teststep.step: Enter valid last name and zip code and select next
teststep.result: - Matched records are displayed - Each account returned includes the following: Name Login ID Phone Email Security Question Security Answer Address

teststep.step: Identify the account you want to change and select next on that record
teststep.result: - Reset password page displays for selected account

teststep.step: Enter new password and select Reset Password
teststep.result: - PASSWORD RESET SUCCESS page displayed

teststep.step: Go to Home Page and Log in to account using new password
teststep.result: - Able to log in with new password

teststep.step: Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your L.L.Bean Password Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received

execution.testSummary: My account - My Profile forms needs to be accesible

teststep.step: Using a screen reader, access the My Profile page
teststep.data: More details can be found here https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=29393125
teststep.result: Screen reader should be able to read the components and messages. (Including title, H tags, fields, buttons, etc)

teststep.step: Using a contrast checker tool, validate the contrast ratio
teststep.data: You can use "WCAG Contrast Checker" FF extension
teststep.result: Regular text and images of regular text MUST have a contrast ratio of at least 4.5 to 1 with the background

teststep.step: Navigate the page using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.)
teststep.result: - Users should be able to properly navigate using keyboard - Focus using the keyboard should be visually identifiable - Edit buttons should be properly linked to their respective zone (Screen reader is able to read what this Edit button is for)

teststep.step: - Edit account's email using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.) and fillout all the required fields with invalid data - Hit Enter key having the focus over any text field
teststep.result: - Users should be able to properly navigate using keyboar - Focus using the keyboard should be visually identifiable - Error message should be displayed correctly. X mark is removed and new icon (red ! icon) is displayed next to the message - Screen reader reads the error and validation messages correctly

teststep.step: - Edit account's email using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.) and fillout all the required fields with invalid data - Hit Enter key having the focus over the Save Button
teststep.result: - Users should be able to properly navigate using keyboar - Focus using the keyboard should be visually identifiable - Error message should be displayed correctly. X mark is removed and new icon (red ! icon) is displayed next to the message - Screen reader reads the error and validation messages correctly

teststep.step: - Edit account's email using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.) and fillout all the required fields with valid data - Save the information
teststep.result: - Email changes must be saved

teststep.step: - Edit Account's Password using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.) and fillout all the required fields with invalid data - Hit Enter key having the focus over any text field
teststep.result: - Users should be able to properly navigate using keyboar - Focus using the keyboard should be visually identifiable - Error message should be displayed correctly. X mark is removed and new icon (red ! icon) is displayed next to the message - Screen reader reads the error and validation messages correctly

teststep.step: - Edit Account's Password using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.) and fillout all the required fields with invalid data - Hit Enter key having the focus over the Save Button
teststep.result: - Users should be able to properly navigate using keyboar - Focus using the keyboard should be visually identifiable - Error message should be displayed correctly. X mark is removed and new icon (red ! icon) is displayed next to the message - Screen reader reads the error and validation messages correctly

teststep.step: - Edit account's Password using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.) and fillout all the required fields with valid data - Save the information
teststep.result: - Password changes must be saved

teststep.step: - Edit Account's Security Question using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.) and fillout all the required fields with invalid data - Hit Enter key having the focus over any text field
teststep.result: - Users should be able to properly navigate using keyboar - Focus using the keyboard should be visually identifiable - Error message should be displayed correctly. X mark is removed and new icon (red ! icon) is displayed next to the message - Screen reader reads the error and validation messages correctly

teststep.step: - Edit Account's Security Question using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.) and fillout all the required fields with invalid data - Hit Enter key having the focus over the Save Button
teststep.result: - Users should be able to properly navigate using keyboar - Focus using the keyboard should be visually identifiable - Error message should be displayed correctly. X mark is removed and new icon (red ! icon) is displayed next to the message - Screen reader reads the error and validation messages correctly

teststep.step: - Edit account's Security Question using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.) and fillout all the required fields with valid data - Save the information
teststep.result: - Security Question changes must be saved

execution.testSummary: Short Form Registered User - Complete Profile with Different Bill to/Ship to (Desktop & Tablet)
execution.components: Address Book,BASASA,Edit Account,Email,Fraud Prevention,Login/Logout,Short Form Registered User

teststep.step: Click Complete My Profile
teststep.result: - My Address Information page is displayed - First Name is populated with the first name on the account - Remaining Address information (Billing / Shipping) is not populated

teststep.step: Complete Address page, leave Same as my Shipping Address checked and click Save
teststep.result: - Account is updated successfully - Saved Addresses page is displayed with new address saved as Billing Address and Default Shipping Address

teststep.step: Go to My Account page
teststep.result: - Login Information Email address is correct for the account Password displays masked Security Question displays the correct selection Security Answer displays masked - Contact Preferences Email Frequency and Catalog Preferences are displayed for the user - Saved Addresses pod: Address information matches what was just entered

teststep.step: After https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the new account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated shows: Shipping Address Billing Address

teststep.step: Click Edit Saved Addresses, on Saved Addresses click Edit to change the billing address and deselect Same as my shipping address
teststep.result: - Only one section is displayed with a label My Address - My Address data matches the address entered and the address shown on the My Profile pod. - Message displays: Note: To place an order you will need to add your shipping address on the Saved Address screen or during checkout.

teststep.step: Click Save
teststep.result: - My Billing Address displays - My Shipping Address displays with No Address Entered

teststep.step: Select Add on My Shipping Address, Update the Shipping Address information (Last Name, Address, City, State, ZIP) and click Save Changes
teststep.result: - Saved Addresses now displays with My Billing Address and My Shipping Address independently and with the correct addresses

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/SFRU+Queries against the ecom database
teststep.result: - SFRU_FLG = 0 - ACCT_LCK_FLG = 0

teststep.step: Using a screen reader, press the Add New Address button
teststep.data: More details can be found here https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=29393125
teststep.result: Screen reader should be able to read the components and messages. (Including title, H tags, fields, buttons, etc)

teststep.step: Using a contrast checker tool, validate the contrast ratio
teststep.data: You can use "WCAG Contrast Checker" FF extension
teststep.result: Regular text and images of regular text MUST have a contrast ratio of at least 4.5 to 1 with the background

teststep.step: - Navigate the page using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.) and fillout all the required fields with invalid data - Hit Enter key having the focus over any text field
teststep.result: - Users should be able to properly navigate using keyboar -Error message should be displayed correctly. X mark is removed and new icon (red ! icon) is displayed next to the message - Focus using the keyboard should be visually identifiable -Screen reader reads the error and validation messages correctly

teststep.step: - Navigate the page using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.) and fillout all the required fields with invalid data - Hit Enter key having the focus over the Save Address button
teststep.result: - Users should be able to properly navigate using keyboar -Error message should be displayed correctly. X mark is removed and new icon (red ! icon) is displayed next to the message - Focus using the keyboard should be visually identifiable -Screen reader reads the error and validation messages correctly

teststep.step: Navigate the page using the keyboard (tabs, arrows, Esc, Enter, etc.) and fillout all the required fields with valid data
